name: Gunpowder on The Teeth: Arcade
description: Megahardcore! In this game you will receive damage first, and only then you will locate the enemy. The implementation of military operations in the classic mechanics of platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Any dual core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB of VRAM Storage: 50 MB available space Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended.
